notesStmt.note: Translation of two articles from Le cabinet jesuitique (p. 1-90): Les secrets des jesuites, and Advis secrets de la Societé de Jesus.
Principal authorship of the Monita secreta societatis Jesu attributed to Hieronim Zahorowski. Cf. Reusch, C. Index der verbotenen Bücher, 1885, v. 2, p. 280-281 ; Encyklopedyja Powszechna.
